data.eml:eml: Liagore pulchella, a new species of xanthid crab (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura) from Vanuatu

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Peter K. L., Naruse, Tohru (2007): Liagore pulchella, a new species of xanthid crab (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura) from Vanuatu. Zootaxa 1665: 53-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180048
